name: Self-Adjusting Top Tree
scenarios: Path and subtree queries/updates on trees
extensions: Supports both path and subtree lazy propagation
Based on Splay Tree with extended node structure (three children)
Uses Compress and Rake operations for tree contraction
references: Self-Adjusting Top Trees - Tarjan and Werneck (2005)
Dynamic trees as search trees via euler tours - Robert E. Tarjan
Randomized fully dynamic graph algorithms - Henzinger et al.
